META AI

Introducing the new
Meta AI app

Experience personal AI and bring your imagination to life with new ways to restyle your videos—all built with our latest models.

Get Meta AI
Learn more

LATEST RELEASES

META AI APP

Talk to your personal AI

Open the new Meta AI app and start talking. It's personal, conversational experience makes it easy to get things done.

ADVANCED CAPABILITIES

Intelligence made for you

With image and video creation tools and personalized responses, Meta AI helps boost your creativity, solve problems and explore new ideas.

Explore features

SEAMLESS ACCESS

Meta AI everywhere

Easily use Meta AI wherever you need it, from the new mobile app, to desktop web, Ray-Ban Meta glasses, and our family of apps.

Get Meta AI
